source_note: State baseline derived from North Dakota Department of Environmental Quality (NDDEQ) Solid Waste Program and local municipal recycling programs.

organics.guidance: Composting of yard waste and food waste is allowed under NDDEQ guidelines; household composting is exempt from permitting.
organics.bin: Yard waste bin or compost drop-off center.
organics.notes: Few curbside compost programs; home composting encouraged.
provenance: North Dakota DEQ Solid Waste Program

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes before placing in bin.
paper_cardboard.notes: Waxed or wet cardboard not accepted.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle bottles and jars if accepted; rinse and remove lids.
glass_containers.bin: Drop-off or separate glass bin; not widely accepted curbside.
glass_containers.notes: Broken glass or ceramics not accepted.
provenance: City of Bismarck and Fargo recycling programs

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle clean aluminum and steel cans.
metal_containers.notes: No scrap metal or pressurized containers.

plastics.guidance: Recycle bottles, jugs, and tubs labeled #1â€“#2; acceptance of other types varies locally.
plastics.notes: No plastic bags, film, or Styrofoam.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: North Dakota does not have a statewide container deposit or refund program.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Recycle in local curbside or drop-off bin.
beverage_containers_crv.notes: No CRV or deposit refund system.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries through HHW events or collection sites.
household_batteries.bin: Battery drop-off or HHW collection facility.
household_batteries.notes: Do not place batteries in household trash.

e_waste.guidance: E-waste accepted at local drop-offs or special collection events; NDDEQ supports recycling partnerships.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at e-waste site or HHW event.
e_waste.notes: Accepted items vary by city or county.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not accepted in curbside recycling.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Keep out of blue bins to prevent contamination.

bulky_items.guidance: Large items must be scheduled for special pickup or dropped at landfill/transfer station.
bulky_items.notes: Fees and policies vary by locality.
